channel.title: Deciding on a Laptop
channel.description:
Due to my fast-approaching move to college, I've decided to replace my shitty refurbished Gateway laptop with something that's better suited to the life of a college geek. Basically, I'm tech savvy & want a fairly powerful, lightweight laptop with a smallish form factor. I've already created a list, I just need some help with my final decision (there are so many options!) Keep in mind that I have a high-end gaming desktop, and thus would only be using this for mobile gaming.
[url=https://www.amazon.com/U36JC-B1-Light-13-3-Inch-Laptop-Black/dp/B004LUU7E4/ref=sr_1_1?s=pc&ie=UTF8&qid=1303929939&sr=1-1]ASUS U36[/url]
[url=https://www.amazon.com/ASUS-N82JQ-B1-14-Inch-Laptop-Brown/dp/B0046EDT7W/ref=sr_1_33?s=pc&ie=UTF8&qid=1303930088&sr=1-33]ASUS N82JQ[/url]
[url=https://www.amazon.com/N43JF-A1-14-Inch-Versatile-Entertainment-Aluminum/dp/B0046HUBHA/ref=sr_1_24?s=pc&ie=UTF8&qid=1303930052&sr=1-24]ASUS N43JF[/url]
[url=https://www.amazon.com/N82JV-X1-14-Inch-Versatile-Entertainment-Laptop/dp/B003VWDQI2/ref=sr_1_4?s=pc&ie=UTF8&qid=1303930052&sr=1-4]ASUS N82JV[/url]
So, what are your thoughts, /b- I mean, Black Mesa Source forums?

item.title: Deciding on a Laptop
item.dc:creator: Saint_Zvlkx
item.description:
sersoft:

links are broken, you put http twice

anyway I’d recommend the one with the smaller screen for better battery life, but you could just buy a dual capacity battery and not worry about that.

These are all small(ish) laptops, it’s just a decision between a few different models.

Read full topic

item.title: Deciding on a Laptop
item.dc:creator: Saint_Zvlkx
item.description:
Due to my fast-approaching move to college, I’ve decided to replace my shitty refurbished Gateway laptop with something that’s better suited to the life of a college geek. Basically, I’m tech savvy & want a fairly powerful, lightweight laptop with a smallish form factor. I’ve already created a list, I just need some help with my final decision (there are so many options!) Keep in mind that I have a high-end gaming desktop, and thus would only be using this for mobile gaming.

ASUS U36

ASUS N82JQ

ASUS N43JF

ASUS N82JV

So, what are your thoughts, /b- I mean, Black Mesa Source forums?
